name: Dual Weapon Fundamentals
description: Mastering the synchronization of sword, knife, and wrist-blade combat through drills that refine control, transitions, and offensive-defensive synergy.

workout_groups.name: Weapon Familiarization & Basic Mechanics
workout_groups.description: Developing control, accuracy, and foundational strikes for dual-wield combat.

workouts.name: Dual-Wield Guard Positioning
workouts.description: Hold and maintain different guard positions while switching between primary and secondary hand.

workouts.name: Basic Knife & Sword Flow Drill
workouts.description: Alternate between sword cuts and knife strikes in a controlled, slow flow sequence.

workouts.name: Introductory Hand-Switching Exercise
workouts.description: Switch dominant hands mid-strike to develop adaptability with both left and right hands.

workouts.name: Close-Quarters Wrist Blade Deployment
workouts.description: Simulate surprise wrist-blade strikes from defensive stances.

workout_groups.name: Dual-Weapon Control & Hand Transitions
workout_groups.description: Training to fluidly switch weapons mid-combat and maintain precise control under pressure.

workouts.name: Rapid Hand-Switching Drill
workouts.description: Switch between sword and knife control without breaking flow.

workouts.name: Defensive to Offensive Transition Flow
workouts.description: Train fluid movement between blocking with a buckler and striking with the opposite hand.

workouts.name: Blade Recovery After Striking
workouts.description: Reposition weapons quickly after strikes to prevent being off-balance.

workouts.name: Off-Hand Precision Cutting
workouts.description: Use the non-dominant hand for controlled, precise cutting movements.

workout_groups.name: Defensive-Redirective Counter Training
workout_groups.description: Balancing shieldwork, parries, and weapon redirections for multi-weapon combat.

workouts.name: Buckler Deflection into Counterstrike
workouts.description: Use a buckler to deflect an incoming strike and follow up with a counter-cut.

workouts.name: Dual-Wield Parry & Counter Attack
workouts.description: Use the knife to intercept attacks while countering with the sword.

workouts.name: Backstep Evade & Return Cut
workouts.description: Step back to avoid an attack, then lunge forward with an immediate return cut.

workout_groups.name: Advanced Dual Weapon Combat Flow
workout_groups.description: Complex sequences of multi-weapon engagements under pressure.

workouts.name: Ambidextrous Blade Flow
workouts.description: Execute continuous attack and defense sequences, switching hands fluidly.

workouts.name: Combat Position Shift Drill
workouts.description: Move dynamically between combat stances while maintaining offensive pressure.

workouts.name: Multi-Strike Attack Chains
workouts.description: Train rapid strike combinations using all weapons fluidly.

workouts.name: Real-Time Adaptive Sparring
workouts.description: React to random opponent movements and adjust weapon positioning accordingly.
